laboratory_examinations.findings: Lesion 1 had a 50-bp deletion involving codons 1502â€“1517. Lesion 2 had a 2-bp deletion at codon 1465. Six of 18 fundic gland polyps had a 1-bp insertion at codon 1556. No genetic alterations in low-grade dysplasia lesions or in 12 out of 18 fundic gland polyps.
Biopsy specimen showed high-grade dysplasia (corresponding to Category 4 in the Vienna classification).
